interpretation: The "face vomiting" emoji represents a strong disgust or revulsion towards something. This could be a situation, a person, or even a thought or idea. It can signify a need to purge or cleanse oneself from a negative influence or feeling. This card is a reminder to trust your instincts and listen to your body when it comes to what is healthy and beneficial for you. It can also symbolize a warning to avoid certain people or situations that may be toxic or harmful. Overall, the "face vomiting" card encourages you to take action towards removing negativity from your life and staying true to your values and boundaries.
